hero.core_tension: Choosing campaign cadence: six-week value-first programs vs compressed takeover windows or short immersive pop-ups, balancing steady weekly measurement against burst visibility.
hero.setting: Backstage retail studio at three-quarter angle; operator and studio lead bent over physical mockups and signage; materials: matte corrugate, satin vinyl, metallic trim.
hero.persona: Store operator (field lead) and studio creative director collaborating, hands-on, decision-focused.
hero.action: Aligning physical playbook — arranging pop-up modules, pinning offer copy, tagging loyalty incentives — no screens shown.
hero.urgency_symbol: Layered bands of diminishing light and overlapping tiles implying weekly cadence and compressed pulses (symbolic timing, not a clock).
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights, crisp falloff, generous negative space.
hero.mood: Precise, collaborative, confident — ready to iterate on weekly metrics.
hero.alt: Store operator and creative lead arrange pop-up mockups under layered bands of light.

signal_map.structure: Concentric arcs and staggered lanes (rings for channel windows, linear bands for week cadence).
elements: site nodes (pop-up locations as minimal discs)
offer ribbons (paths linking promotions to loyalty signals)
signal_map.motion: Radial pulses and converging flows that speed and slow to imply burst vs sustained campaigns.
signal_map.palette: Matte neutrals with saturated retail primaries and brushed-metal accents; materials suggested: paper, vinyl, anodized metal.
signal_map.alt: Abstract rings and pulses map campaign cadence and pop-up site nodes.

case_studies.scene: Walmart value-first pop-up staging, over-the-shoulder three-quarter angle; backroom-to-floor transition with corrugated mockups and vinyl banners.
case_studies.moment: Setting a six-week rhythm: a tiered sequence of printed week-tokens arranged like stepping stones to imply weekly reporting cadence.
case_studies.persona: Store operations manager and brand studio producer conferring, hands adjusting shelf vignettes.
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial, directional rim light on hands and materials, clean negative space.
case_studies.mood: Iterative, precise, pragmatic — focused on measurable weekly AOV and sign-up lifts.
case_studies.alt: Operator and studio producer arrange value-first pop-up with tiered week markers.

case_studies.scene: Department-store creative table, high-angle flat lay of BNPL and cash-back collateral; glossy stock and embossed loyalty samples on a dark matte surface.
case_studies.moment: Experiment design moment: split-path lighting implies deferred payment vs immediate reward trade-offs without literal financial screens.
case_studies.persona: Merchandising operator and finance-minded studio strategist reviewing printed offer permutations.
props: promo receipts and printed test variants
case_studies.lighting: Crisp editorial highlights with controlled shadow, strong material texture.
case_studies.mood: Analytical, persuasive, confident — focused on AOV delta and percent-BNPL KPIs.
case_studies.alt: Operator and studio test BNPL and cash-back collateral with ledger-like light paths.

case_studies.scene: Immersive pop-up install, wide-angle low perspective framing an entry arch; tactile fabrics and reflective panels being adjusted.
case_studies.moment: Two-week intensity signaled by a tight band of saturated color and rapidly recurring light pulses, symbolizing short high-impact windows.
case_studies.persona: Creative director and field ops lead calibrating environmental elements and loyalty opt-in touchpoints (non-digital).
props: paper-based opt-in forms and wristband prototypes
case_studies.lighting: Editorial yet immersive: confident highlights on textures, deep negative space to frame the activation.
case_studies.mood: Energetic, experimental, urgent but controlled — designed to drive opt-ins and repeat visits.
case_studies.alt: Creative director and operator tune an immersive pop-up with a tight band of color signaling urgency.
